text: Two friends went to their favorite spot to have lunch by a lake in the forest. One friend pushed the other when she refused to catch a frog and instead wanted to sit down and eat lunch. When the girl who was pushed into the lake emerged, a frog was present. The dry friend scooped the frog up as the girl who was pushed laughed and then warned her friend that she'll get back at her for the incident.

The friends were camping in the woods at the lake. It was the afternoon and one was eating a sandwich, the other wanted to catch a frog, so pushed the first one into the lake. When she emerged she had a frog on her head. She declared she would get revenge.

My friend pushed me into a lake. It was at a summer camp. We were all enjoying a peaceful afternoon. She had asked me to catch a frog. I had just sat down to eat my lunch. So I said no. Course friends don't always take no for an answer. So she crept up behind me. And pushed me into the lake. I saw on the shore a frog. Which she picked up. And handed to me. I couldn't help but laugh. Uncontrollably.

My best friend pushed me into a lake on our annual camping trip to our favourite place. What happened was she dared me to push a frog but I was eating my sandwich so told her no. She gave me a little nudge and I fell in. I got out of the lake and she picked the frog and handed it to me. I laughed uncontrollably and said I would get revenge.

I was at the lake with my best friend and I fell in. This had all started because of a frog. We were at our favourite part of the lake and my friend had told me to catch a frog. I told her I was not interested. Friends don't take no for an answer so she gave me a little nudge and pushed me in. When I got out of the lake she handed me a frog and I started to laugh uncontrollably. I said I would get revenge on her, "just you wait".

I was on summer holiday with my friend and we were beside the lake, she saw a frog and dared me to catch it. I was eating a sandwich and said I wasn't interested, but she gave me a nudge and I fell into the water, when I emerged the frog was on the shore, she picked it up and handed it to me. We both laughed, but I told her I'd get her back at some point.

A kid was at summer camp and was pushed into the lake by a friend, this happened because he was eating a sandwich and his friend asked him to catch a frog to which he declined because he wasn't interested but his friend didn't take no for an answer and pushed him in, to his surprise when he emerged from the water he spotted the frog and his friend grabbed the frog and he started laughing uncontrollably and vowed he would get his friend back soon enough.

A friend of mine pushed me in the lake. This happened on our camping trip in the afternoon. She saw a frog near the water at our favorite spot close to the wood. She asked me to catch it, I was eating a sandwich and I said no. She didn't take no for an answer, She came behind and pushed me into the water. When I came up, the frog was there, She picked up and gave it to me. All I did was laugh and I told her I wanted revenge and very soon.

My best friend pushed me into the lake. This happened at our annual camping trip, at our favourite spot. She spotted a frog at the edge and asked me to catch it. I had just sat down to eat my sandwich and refused. 'Course, thats the thing about friends, they dont always take no for an answer. She snuck up behind me and pushed me into the water. When I came back up, there was a frog on the shore, which she simply scooped up and handed it to me. I couldnt let this go without some revenge, so I told her "just you wait". She laughed.
